extension.description: Keymap Edit is a GUI for configuring mappings for remotes, keyboard and other inputs supported by xbmc. Note: existing user defined key mappings will be removed.[CR][I]This is a Keymap Editor fork. Credit goes to original creator (takoi)[/I]
